LanguageData.SmokeleafCannagar.label: smokeleaf cannagar
LanguageData.SmokeleafCannagar.description: Smokeleaf buds wrapped around a stick and rolled in leaves soaked with oil. Very potent and very expensive. The drug improves mood, but also increases appetite, reduces focus and slows movement. While not physically addictive, users may still develop a psychological dependence.
LanguageData.CHO.label: smokeleaf hash oil
LanguageData.CHO.description: Smokeleaf Hash Oil is a smokeleaf extract prepared using Chemfuel. Since S.H.O. is vaporized, some of the harmful effects are eliminated, but due to the method of it's extraction, other risks are increased. While not physically addictive, users may still develop a psychological dependence.
LanguageData.CrudeSmokeleafJoint.label: crude smokeleaf joint
LanguageData.CrudeSmokeleafJoint.description: Smokeleaf plant material clumsily rolled for smoking. The drug improves mood, but also increases appetite, reduces focus and slows movement. Can be produced without equipment, at a crafting spot. Smoking a crude joint is a very wasteful method. While not physically addictive, users may still develop a psychological dependence.
LanguageData.SmokeleafDistillate.label: smokeleaf distillate
LanguageData.SmokeleafDistillate.description: Smokeleaf distillate is the ultimate extract. Gives a clean high without the risks of other smokeleaf products. While not physically addictive, users may still develop a psychological dependence.
LanguageData.SmokeleafHash.label: smokeleaf hash
LanguageData.SmokeleafHash.description: Smokeleaf hash is the original concentrated form of smokeleaf. It is made from the resin collected from the buds. While not physically addictive, users may still develop a psychological dependence.
LanguageData.SmokeleafLotion.label: 연초 로션
LanguageData.SmokeleafLotion.description: A topical lotion that can heal old scars, numb pain and restore some movement.
LanguageData.SmokeleafPills.label: smokeleaf pills
LanguageData.SmokeleafPills.description: A pill form medicinal that offers preventative treatment (Malaria and Plague), aids in recovery and provides mild pain relief. May cause drowsiness.
LanguageData.SmokeleafTincture.label: 연초 팅크약
LanguageData.SmokeleafTincture.description: A potent tincture that offers considerable pain relief, and helps with sleep. Best taken before bed.
LanguageData.Mote_StonedCloud.label: Mote
LanguageData.GrowLamp.label: grow lamp
LanguageData.GrowLamp.description: A power efficient grow light designed for indoor use, with a built-in timer.
LanguageData.MSI_TubeGrowLights.label: grow light fixture
LanguageData.MSI_TubeGrowLights.description: A tube light system designed for growing plants, but, is cost effective enough, that it works well in other areas too. Stays lit 24 hours a day.
LanguageData.MSI_StonePlanter.label: 화분
LanguageData.MSI_StonePlanter.description: A stone planter for smokeleaf or other plants. The soil is fertilized to encourage rapid growth at 1.5x the normal rate. Requires light and heat.
LanguageData.MSI_WoodenPlanter.label: 화분
LanguageData.MSI_WoodenPlanter.description: A wooden planter for smokeleaf or other plants. The soil is fertilized to encourage rapid growth at 2x the normal rate. Requires light and heat.
LanguageData.SpaceBucket.label: space bucket
LanguageData.SpaceBucket.description: A self-contained growing system. Uses a fair amount of power for a single plant, but grows plants at 5x the normal rate. Ideal for growing in confined spaces. Requires heat.
LanguageData.HempolineGenerator.label: hempoline-powered generator
LanguageData.HempolineGenerator.description: Produces power by burning hempoline. Must be periodically refueled by hand.
LanguageData.HempPowerConduit.label: hempene power conduit
LanguageData.HempPowerConduit.description: A hempene Glittertech power conduit. Casts a nice green light around it, making it less of an eyesore. Can be placed under walls, other buildings and connects to regular conduits.
LanguageData.HempBattery.label: hempene battery
LanguageData.HempBattery.description: A Glittertech battery made from superconductive hemp nanosheets, capable of storing more power than normal battery. Warning - charged batteries tend to explode when exposed to rain or fire.
LanguageData.HempSolarGenerator.label: hempene solar generator
LanguageData.HempSolarGenerator.description: A Glittertech solar generator, made with superconductive hempene, which is much more efficient than traditional solar generators. Does not work in the dark.
LanguageData.PoweredCultivationBench.label: cultivation bench
LanguageData.PoweredCultivationBench.description: A workbench designed specifically to process smokeleaf. New recreational drugs and bulk recipes have been added. Can work without electricity at a severly reduced speed.
LanguageData.MedicinalsLab.label: medicinals lab
LanguageData.MedicinalsLab.description: An advanced lab for the processing of smokeleaf into it's purest medicinal forms. Must have power to function.
LanguageData.SmokeleafAutoTrimmer.label: smokeleaf auto trimmer
LanguageData.SmokeleafAutoTrimmer.description: Processes raw smokeleaf into usable products with increased speed and reduced power usage in large quantities.
LanguageData.TrimmingTools.label: trimming tools
LanguageData.TrimmingTools.description: Increases work speed. Needs to be placed near workbench. One workbench can be simultaneously linked to only two tools cabinets.
LanguageData.BlocksHempcrete.label: hempcrete blocks
LanguageData.BlocksHempcrete.description: Blocks made of a hemp composite. Hempcrete is not flammable, but it's not very strong either.
LanguageData.SmokeleafButter.label: 연초잎 버터
LanguageData.SmokeleafButter.description: Butter made from simmering smokeleaf buds with milk. Creates a potent base for edibles. Can be eaten raw to get high, although it tastes horrible.
LanguageData.HempFlour.label: hemp flour
LanguageData.HempFlour.description: Smokeleaf seeds can be ground into a fine flour for baking.
LanguageData.HempMilk.label: hemp milk
LanguageData.HempMilk.description: "Milk" made from smokeleaf seeds that are soaked and ground in water. Can be used as an alternative to animal milk when cooking.
LanguageData.HempProtein.label: hemp Protein
LanguageData.HempProtein.description: A protein powder made from crushed smokeleaf seeds. Can be used as an alternative protein source when cooking.
LanguageData.SmokeleafSeedOil.label: smokeleaf seed oil
LanguageData.SmokeleafSeedOil.description: Oils pressed from smokeleaf seeds. While seed oil does not possess any medicinal qualities, it has many various uses.
LanguageData.SmokeleafBrownie.label: smokeleaf brownie
LanguageData.SmokeleafBrownie.description: The infamous "special" smokeleaf brownie. Slightly addictive!
LanguageData.SmokeleafCookie.label: smokeleaf cookie
LanguageData.SmokeleafCookie.description: A smokeleaf butter cookie. Get comfortable.
LanguageData.SmokeleafNutriLeaf.label: NutriLeaf bar (smokeleaf)
LanguageData.SmokeleafNutriLeaf.description: A chewy, fruit filled, smokeleaf infused snack bar. Great snack to bring on the road.
LanguageData.SmokeleafDeEnergyDrink.label: smokeleaf de-energy drink
LanguageData.SmokeleafSmoothie.label: smokeleaf smoothie
LanguageData.SmokeleafSmoothie.description: A delicious fruit smoothie with a smokeleaf kick. Very nutritious.
LanguageData.SmokeleafCandy.label: smokeleaf candy
LanguageData.SmokeleafCandy.description: A tasty fruit flavored infused confection.
LanguageData.MealInfused.label: infused meal
LanguageData.MealInfused.description: A filling meal that also gives a slight buzz.
LanguageData.HempFiber.label: hemp fibers
LanguageData.HempFiber.description: Leftover stalks and leaves from trimming the smokeleaf plant.
LanguageData.SmokeleafBuds.label: smokeleaf buds
LanguageData.SmokeleafBuds.description: The flower of the smokeleaf plant. Contains all the good stuff.
LanguageData.SmokeleafSeed.label: smokeleaf seed
LanguageData.SmokeleafSeed.description: The seed of a smokeleaf plant.
LanguageData.HempCloth.label: hemp fabric
LanguageData.DevilsleafFabric.label: devilsleaf fabric
LanguageData.DevilsleafFabric.description: Hemp fibers woven into devilstrand to make a new textile with the best qualities of each material.
LanguageData.HempBiocomposite.label: hemp biocomposite
LanguageData.HempBiocomposite.description: A biocomposite material made from hemp fibers, hemp fabric and biocoal. Useful as a sustainable alternative for metals. Slightly greater tensile strength than steel.
LanguageData.HempBiocoal.label: hemp biocoal
LanguageData.HempBiocoal.description: The result of heating up hemp fibers to extremely high temperatures. Originally intended for use as a fuel source, it is now mainly recognized for it's utility in the creation of a renewable alternative to steel.
LanguageData.HempNanosheet.label: hemp nanosheet
LanguageData.HempNanosheet.description: A Glitterworld material made from carbonized hemp fibers and plasteel. It is used in advanced equipment for it's highly conductive properties.
LanguageData.Hempoline.label: hempoline
LanguageData.Hempoline.description: A safe, stable fuel produced from refined smokeleaf stalks and seeds. Non-volatile, but goes bad eventually. Can be used in hempoline-powered generators, or as an alternative fuel for the chemfuel-powered generator.
LanguageData.CBD.label: CBD
LanguageData.CBD.description: A compound identified in the smokeleaf plant that has vast medical potential. On it's own, it is more effective than herbal medicine, but not as effective as standard industrial medicine. CBD can be combined with other medicine to create an even more effective form of treatment.
LanguageData.InfusedMedicine.label: infused medicine
LanguageData.InfusedMedicine.description: Industrial medicine infused with CBD. More effective than regular medicine, but not as effective as glitterworld medicine.
LanguageData.MSI_SOG.label: smokeleaf plant (SOG)
LanguageData.MSI_SOG.description: A leafy plant cultivated for its psychological effects. Using the 'Sea Of Green' technique takes less time to grow, but produces a smaller yeild.
LanguageData.MSI_SCROG.label: smokeleaf plant (SCROG)
LanguageData.MSI_SCROG.description: A leafy plant cultivated for its psychological effects. Using the 'Screen Of Green' technique takes more time to grow, but produces a higher yeild.
LanguageData.SmokeleafJoint.description.description: Smokeleaf buds broken up and rolled into a joint. The drug improves mood, but also increases appetite, reduces focus and slows movement. While not physically addictive, users may still develop a psychological dependence.
LanguageData.Plant_Smokeleaf.description.description: A leafy plant cultivated for its psychological effects. Smokeleaf provides a relaxed, mellow high. Smokeleaf plants can be seperated into a few base ingredients. These ingredients can make food, medicine, and powerful drugs.
